info.name: NexCrest E-Commerce API
info.description: API collection for NexCrest E-Commerce application - Brands, Genders, and Scent Families endpoints

item.name: Customer Authentication

request.description: Register a new customer. Either email or phone (or both) is required.
Login customer using email or phone number. The 'identifier' field can be either email or phone.
Get the currently authenticated customer. Requires authentication.
Logout the currently authenticated customer.

item.description: Customer authentication endpoints for registration and login

item.name: Cart

request.description: Get all items in the customer's cart. Requires authentication.
Get cart summary (total items, subtotal, etc.). Requires authentication.
Add a product to the cart. If the product already exists, the quantity will be increased. Requires authentication.
Update a cart item (quantity or attributes). Requires authentication.
Remove a specific item from the cart. Requires authentication.
Clear all items from the cart. Requires authentication.

item.description: Shopping cart management endpoints. All endpoints require authentication.

item.name: Wishlist
item.description: Customer wishlist management endpoints. All endpoints require authentication.

request.description: Get all wishlist items for the authenticated customer.
Get wishlist summary (total wishlist items count).
Add a product to the customer's wishlist.
Remove a product from the wishlist.

item.name: Products

query.description: Search by name, SKU, or description
Sort field: name, price, created_at, sort_order, rating, sold_count

request.description: Get paginated list of active products with filtering and sorting options.

item.name: Get Product by ID or Slug

request.description: Get a single product by ID or slug. View count is automatically incremented.
Get featured products.
Get new products.
Get bestseller products.

item.description: Product listing endpoints. All endpoints are public (no authentication required).

request.description: Retrieve all active categories sorted by sort order.

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "data": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "Category Name",
            "slug": "category-name",
            "description": "Category description",
            "image": "categories/image.jpg",
            "image_url": "http://localhost/storage/categories/image.jpg",
            "is_active": true,
            "sort_order": 0,
            "meta_title": null,
            "meta_description": null,
            "meta_keywords": null,
            "created_at": "2025-01-15T10:00:00.000000Z",
            "updated_at": "2025-01-15T10:00:00.000000Z"
        }
    ]
}

query.description: Filter by active status (true/false). Default: true
Search by name, description, or slug. Optional

request.description: Retrieve all brands. By default, returns only active brands.

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "data": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "Brand Name",
            "slug": "brand-name",
            "description": "Brand description",
            "logo": "brands/logo.jpg",
            "logo_url": "http://localhost/storage/brands/logo.jpg",
            "website": "https://example.com",
            "is_active": true,
            "is_featured": false,
            "sort_order": 0,
            "meta_title": null,
            "meta_description": null,
            "meta_keywords": null,
            "created_at": "2025-01-15T10:00:00.000000Z",
            "updated_at": "2025-01-15T10:00:00.000000Z"
        }
    ],
    "message": "Brands retrieved successfully"
}

request.description: Retrieve a single brand by its ID.

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "Brand Name",
        "slug": "brand-name",
        "description": "Brand description",
        "logo": "brands/logo.jpg",
        "logo_url": "http://localhost/storage/brands/logo.jpg",
        "website": "https://example.com",
        "is_active": true,
        "is_featured": false,
        "sort_order": 0,
        "meta_title": null,
        "meta_description": null,
        "meta_keywords": null,
        "created_at": "2025-01-15T10:00:00.000000Z",
        "updated_at": "2025-01-15T10:00:00.000000Z"
    },
    "message": "Brand retrieved successfully"
}

query.description: Filter by status (true/false). Default: true (active only)

request.description: Retrieve all genders. By default, returns only active genders.

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Retrieve a single gender by its ID.

query.description: Filter by status (true/false). Default: true (active only)

request.description: Retrieve all scent families. By default, returns only active scent families.

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Retrieve a single scent family by its ID.

item.name: Orders

request.description: Get all orders for the authenticated customer. Requires authentication.

Create a new order for the authenticated customer. Requires authentication.

Notes:
- order_number and status are auto-generated (status defaults to pending).
- total_amount is calculated from the customer's cart items.
- Provide notes if needed.
Get all pending orders for the authenticated customer. Requires authentication.
Get all completed orders for the authenticated customer. Requires authentication.

item.description: Order management endpoints. All endpoints require authentication.

item.name: Addresses

request.description: Get all addresses for the authenticated customer. Requires authentication.
Get a single address by ID. Requires authentication.

body.raw:
{
    "address": "123 Main Street, Apartment 4B",
    "city": "Mumbai",
    "state": "Maharashtra",
    "district": "Mumbai Suburban",
    "landmark": "Near City Mall",
    "pincode": "400001",
    "phone": "+919876543210",
    "identification_mark": "Red gate at entrance",
    "is_default": true
}

request.description: Create a new address for the authenticated customer. Requires authentication.

body.raw:
{
    "address": "456 Park Avenue",
    "city": "Delhi",
    "state": "Delhi",
    "district": "South Delhi",
    "landmark": "Opposite Metro Station",
    "pincode": "110001",
    "phone": "+919876543211",
    "identification_mark": "Blue building",
    "is_default": false
}

request.description: Update an existing address. Requires authentication.
Delete an address. Requires authentication.

item.description: Address management endpoints for customers. All endpoints require authentication.

request.description: Get all reviews for a product with pagination. Returns average rating and total review count. Public endpoint.
Get reviews for a product filtered by specific rating (1-5). Public endpoint.
Add a new review for a product. Requires authentication. Rating must be 1-5, comment must be at least 10 characters. Verified purchase status is automatically determined.
Update an existing review. Only the review author can update their review. Requires authentication.
Delete a review. Only the review author can delete their review. Requires authentication.
Get all questions for a product with pagination. Returns question statistics. Public endpoint.
Get only answered questions for a product. Public endpoint.
Get details of a specific question. Public endpoint.
Ask a new question about a product. Requires authentication. Question must be 10-500 characters.
Update your own question. Only allowed before it's answered. Requires authentication.
Delete your own question. Only the question author can delete. Requires authentication.
Mark a question as helpful. Increments the helpful count. Requires authentication.
Get all active carousel items with pagination and statistics. Public endpoint.
Get a single carousel item by ID. Public endpoint.
Get all carousels including inactive ones. Admin only. Requires authentication.

body.raw:
{
    "title": "Summer Collection 2025",
    "subtitle": "Discover our new perfume collection",
    "button_name": "Shop Now",
    "button_url": "/shop/summer-collection",
    "image": "/images/carousel/summer-2025.jpg",
    "sort_order": 1,
    "is_active": true
}

request.description: Create a new carousel item. Admin only. Requires authentication.
Update carousel item. Admin only. Requires authentication.
Delete a carousel item. Admin only. Requires authentication.
Toggle carousel active/inactive status. Admin only. Requires authentication.

variable.description: Base URL for the API. Change this to your actual server URL.
Customer authentication token (if using Sanctum). Set this after login.
